column5: i found a rod and reel combo on the Grand river saturday ! Tell me what it is and i'll arrange to get it back to you !!
it was a reel and a rod, now give it back!
GOOD ON YA TO ASK AROUND AND OFFER IT BACK WISER!!! NOT MANY WOULD IN THESE TIMES.
haha steve what the heck are you doing with me as your avatar.........anyone who knows me will ay its a spitting image for me ....lol thanks for the chuckle mind sending it to me lol
Lol we all know you need all the help you can get catching fish ! But your going to have to do better than that
good on you for returning it now it was a grey rod with bland wraps with a silver to black sort of reel.....when can I pick it up
If its yours I'm for sure not giving it back you have way too many as it is !
that was funny..Since you have been here another 5 have made it in the rack!! its not mine Im just joshing
Its been three hours, its yours now.
its mine  .. its a rod about yay long {-----------------------------------------------------------) and the reel spins in one direction and its the colour i choose when i bought it

I can't imagine how someone forgets their fishing rod.  take it to the cops, some kid might be looking for it.  A cynical adult won't bother checking with cops.  I think you get it if unclaimed for 30 days right?
Also might be a good idea to call the local baitshop and have them put the word out....this has worked before in similar situations....

Baitshop knows ! As far as the cop thing goes im not running all over town in hopes of finding an owner ,   I have better things to do its posted on 3 websites and notified marina owner if that doesnt work buddy is outta luck
